casebody.data:
STATE v. HEATH No. COA05-227 North Carolina Court of Appeals Filed February 7, 2006 Certification Date February 27, 2006 Appeal from Pitt (03CRS57879).

Case reported without published opinion. Habitual Impaired Driving-No error. Driving While License Revoked-No error. Providing Fictitious Information to an Officer-Vacated.
